metadata.title: CVE-2024-21783 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer overflow for some Intel(R) VPL software before version 24.1.4 mayallow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilegevia local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-21783` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmfx-gen1.2 - 24.3.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-mediasdk package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
onevpl-intel-gpu package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '24.3.4-1').
